trans-unit.source: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Node.js | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Node.js | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get started with Azure Redis Cache using Node.js and node_redis.
trans-unit.target: Get started with Azure Redis Cache using Node.js and node_redis.

trans-unit.source: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Node.js
trans-unit.target: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Node.js

trans-unit.source: Azure Redis Cache gives you access to a secure, dedicated Redis cache, managed by Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Azure Redis Cache gives you access to a secure, dedicated Redis cache, managed by Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Your cache is accessible from any application within Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Your cache is accessible from any application within Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to get started with Azure Redis Cache using Node.js.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to get started with Azure Redis Cache using Node.js.

trans-unit.source: For another example of using Azure Redis Cache with Node.js, see [Build a Node.js Chat Application with Socket.IO on an Azure Website][].
trans-unit.target: For another example of using Azure Redis Cache with Node.js, see [Build a Node.js Chat Application with Socket.IO on an Azure Website][].

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Install [node_redis](https://github.com/mranney/node_redis):
trans-unit.target: Install [node_redis](https://github.com/mranney/node_redis):

trans-unit.source: This tutorial uses [node_redis](https://github.com/mranney/node_redis), but you can use any Node.js client listed at [http://redis.io/clients](http://redis.io/clients).
trans-unit.target: This tutorial uses [node_redis](https://github.com/mranney/node_redis), but you can use any Node.js client listed at [http://redis.io/clients](http://redis.io/clients).

trans-unit.source: Create a Redis cache on Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a Redis cache on Azure

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398536), click **New**, **Data + Storage**, and select **Redis Cache**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398536), click **New**, **Data + Storage**, and select **Redis Cache**.

trans-unit.source: Enter a DNS hostname.
trans-unit.target: Enter a DNS hostname.

trans-unit.source: It will have the form `<name>.redis.cache.windows.net`.
trans-unit.target: It will have the form `<name>.redis.cache.windows.net`.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Once you create the cache, click on it in the preview portal to view the cache settings.
trans-unit.target: Once you create the cache, click on it in the preview portal to view the cache settings.

trans-unit.source: Click the link under **Keys** and copy the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Click the link under **Keys** and copy the primary key.

trans-unit.source: You need this to authenticate requests.
trans-unit.target: You need this to authenticate requests.

trans-unit.source: Enable the non-SSL endpoint
trans-unit.target: Enable the non-SSL endpoint

trans-unit.source: Click the link under **Ports**, and click **No** for "Allow access only via SSL".
trans-unit.target: Click the link under **Ports**, and click **No** for "Allow access only via SSL".

trans-unit.source: This enables the non-SSL port for the cache.
trans-unit.target: This enables the non-SSL port for the cache.

trans-unit.source: The node_redis client currently does not support SSL.
trans-unit.target: The node_redis client currently does not support SSL.

trans-unit.source: Add something to the cache and retrieve it
trans-unit.target: Add something to the cache and retrieve it

trans-unit.source: Output:
trans-unit.target: Output:

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: [Enable cache diagnostics](cache-how-to-monitor.md#enable-cache-diagnostics) so you can [monitor](cache-how-to-monitor.md) the health of your cache.
trans-unit.target: [Enable cache diagnostics](cache-how-to-monitor.md#enable-cache-diagnostics) so you can [monitor](cache-how-to-monitor.md) the health of your cache.

trans-unit.source: Read the official [Redis documentation](http://redis.io/documentation).
trans-unit.target: Read the official [Redis documentation](http://redis.io/documentation).
